name: monaural
content:
monaural adjective
(EAR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or using only one ear: All the participants in the study had monaural hearing loss. This wooden monaural stethoscope was made in the 19th century. We discovered that her hearing loss was only monaural.
More examplesFewer examplesThe average price of a monaural hearing aid is high.

monaural adjective
(SOUND)
(also monophonic) recording or playing sound in a way that produces a single signal, or relating to this kind of sound: The audio is monaural, but the music sounds pretty clear. Good stereo recordings have great advantages over monaural sound.
More examplesFewer examplesThe new radio receivers could still receive monaural signals.It is difficult to find customers for monaural recordings.
